results.title: Simvastatin retards progression of retinopathy in diabetic patients with hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to compare the HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, with placebo in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ having @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@DR@@@ in a double-blind randomized placebo-controlled trial.

citations.NLM: Sen K, Misra A, Kumar A, Pandey RM. Simvastatin retards progression of retinopathy in diabetic patients with hypercholesterolemia. Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2002 Apr;56(1):1-11. PMID: 11879715

results.title: Simvastatin use associated with low intraocular ADP levels in patients with sight-threatening diabetic retinopathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ use associated with low intraocular @CHEMICAL_Adenosine_Diphosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000244 @@@ADP@@@ levels in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with sight-threatening @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@.

results.title: Fibrates and statins in the treatment of diabetic retinopathy.
results.text_hl: In the ACCORD-EYE study, the combination of @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced by 40% the rate of progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Ansquer JC, Crimet D, Foucher C. Fibrates and statins in the treatment of diabetic retinopathy. Curr Pharm Biotechnol. 2011 Mar 1;12(3):396-405. PMID: 20939802

results.title: Simvastatin increases circulating endothelial progenitor cells and reduces the formation and progression of diabetic retinopathy in rats.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to observe the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on EPC mobilization, which could alter the rate of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@DR@@@) formation and progression.

results.title: Role of NADPH oxidase and Stat3 in statin-mediated protection against diabetic retinopathy.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ protects against the early signs of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ by preventing NADPH oxidase-mediated activation of @GENE_STAT3 @GENE_25125 @@@STAT3@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Shabrawey M, Bartoli M, El-Remessy AB, Ma G, Matragoon S, Lemtalsi T, Caldwell RW, Caldwell RB. Role of NADPH oxidase and Stat3 in statin-mediated protection against diabetic retinopathy. Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2008 Jul;49(7):3231-8. PMID: 18378570

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits leukocyte accumulation and vascular permeability in the retinas of rats with streptozotocin-induced diabetes.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may thus be useful in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@.

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on CAT-1-mediated arginine transport and NO level under high glucose conditions in conditionally immortalized rat inner blood-retinal barrier cell lines (TR-iBRB).
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might be a good modulator for @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ therapy by increasing of the @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@l-arginine@@@ uptake and improving endothelial function in retinal capillary endothelial cells.

results.title: Low intravitreal angiopoietin-2 and VEGF levels in vitrectomized diabetic patients with simvastatin treatment.
results.text_hl: These data provide a novel insight into the potential protective mechanisms underlying @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ medication in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy complications@@@.

results.title: Fenofibrate: a review of its use in dyslipidaemia.
results.text_hl: However, the risk of some nonfatal macrovascular events and the incidence of certain microvascular outcomes were reduced significantly more with @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ than with placebo in the FIELD trial, and in the ACCORD trial, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ were less likely to experience progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ than those receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus placebo.

citations.NLM: McKeage K, Keating GM. Fenofibrate: a review of its use in dyslipidaemia. Drugs. 2011 Oct 1;71(14):1917-46. PMID: 21942979
